name: cluster2html
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Generates an HTML report from cluster-based FEAT analysis

inputs.description: Directory containing the FEAT analysis results
inputs.name: FEAT directory

inputs.description: Root name for cluster files (should not contain the _std extension)
inputs.name: Input root

inputs.description: Indicate that the input files contain the _std extension
inputs.name: Standard Deviation Flag
